annotations.openshift.io/display-name: Job to deploy a letsencrypt controller.

parameters.description:
If set to true, no action will be performed. The pod will just print
what would have been executed.
parameters.name: DRY_RUN

parameters.description:
The desired namespace to deploy resources to. Defaults to the current
one.
parameters.name: NAMESPACE

parameters.description:
Whether to forcefully replace existing objects and configuration files. To replace
exising secrets as well, RECREATE_SECRETS needs to be set.
parameters.name: FORCE_REDEPLOY

parameters.description: Whether to replace secrets like SDI Registry's htpasswd file if they exist already.
parameters.name: REPLACE_SECRETS

parameters.description:
Unless given, a local copy will be used.
Defaults to a local check out. Example value: https://github.com/tnozicka/openshift-acme
parameters.name: LETSENCRYPT_REPOSITORY

parameters.description: Revision of letsencrypt repository to check out.
parameters.name: LETSENCRYPT_REVISION

parameters.description: Either "live" or "staging". Use the latter when debugging SDI Observer's deployment.
parameters.name: LETSENCRYPT_ENVIRONMENT

parameters.description:
Additional projects to monitor separated by commas. The controller will be granted
permission to manage routes in the projects. The job needs to be able to create roles
and rolebindings in all the projects listed.
parameters.name: PROJECTS_TO_MONITOR

parameters.description: Pull specification of the built SDI Observer image.
parameters.name: JOB_IMAGE

parameters.description: Arguments for job's script. Passed as a json array of strings.
parameters.name: SCRIPT_ARGUMENTS
